Package eus.klimu.notification.api

Class UserNotificationController

java.lang.Object
eus.klimu.notification.api.UserNotificationController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/user-notification")
public class UserNotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
Create, update, delete and get information for the UserNotifications. They represent the different notifications a user has configured for a specific channel. Takes care of all the CRUD methods, working with the database through an internal Service.

  • Method Details

    • getUserNotification

      @GetMapping(value="/{id}", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserNotification> getUserNotification​(@PathVariable long id)

      Get a user notification based on its ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user-notification/{id}

      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user notification that is going to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the AppUser was found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUserNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserNotification>> getUserNotifications()

      Get all the user notifications from the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user-notification/all

      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the User Notifications were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUserNotificationsByChannel

      @GetMapping(value="/all/channel", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserNotification>> getUserNotificationsByChannel​(@RequestBody ChannelDTO channel)

      Get all the user notifications for an specific channel.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user-notification/all/channel

      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      channel - The channel that is going to be used on the query.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the User Notifications were found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getUserNotificationsByNotification

      @GetMapping(value="/all/notification", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserNotification>> getUserNotificationsByNotification​(@RequestBody LocalizedNotificationDTO notification)

    • createUserNotification

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserNotification> createUserNotification​(@RequestBody UserNotificationDTO userNotification)

      Save a new user notification on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user-notification/create

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      userNotification - The User Notification that is going to be created.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok if the User Notification was created or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createAllUserNotifications

      @PostMapping(value="/create/all", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<UserNotification>> createAllUserNotifications​(@RequestBody java.util.List<UserNotificationDTO> userNotifications)

      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.

    • deleteUserNotification

      @DeleteMapping(value="/delete", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> deleteUserNotification​(@RequestBody UserNotificationDTO userNotification)

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/user-notification/delete

      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
